title: New BH Lynx Race Carbon RC slashes cost of race-proven XC, downcountry mountain bikes
content:
BH’s new Lynx Race Carbon RC slashes more than 1/3 of the cost of entry off their latest lightweight, trail-ready XC mountain bike thanks to a more affordable, but still light carbon construction. Weighing just 350g more than the EVO, BH’s newest RC addition to their short-travel carbon full-suspension MTB family means plenty of more
